columns.staff_id: The unique identifier for each staff member.
columns.gender: The gender of the staff member, represented by a single character.
columns.first_name: The first name of the staff member.
columns.last_name: The last name of the staff member.
columns.email_address: The email address used for communication with the staff member.
columns.phone_number: The phone number for contacting the staff member.

Staff.table_description: The table stores information about staff members in the organization.

columns.customer_id: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.customer_type_code: The classification of the customer based on credit status.
columns.address_line_1: The primary address line for the customer.
columns.address_line_2: The secondary address line for the customer.
columns.town_city: The town or city where the customer resides.
columns.state: The state in which the customer is located.
columns.email_address: The primary email address for contacting the customer.
columns.phone_number: The phone number for reaching the customer.

Customers.table_description: The table stores customer information for managing complaints.

columns.product_id: The unique identifier for each product.
columns.parent_product_id: The identifier for the parent product, if applicable.
columns.product_category_code: The category classification for the product.
columns.date_product_first_available: The date when the product first became available.
columns.date_product_discontinued: The date when the product was discontinued.
columns.product_description: The detailed description of the product.
columns.product_price: The selling price of the product.

Products.table_description: The table stores product information for customer complaints management.

columns.complaint_id: The unique identifier for each complaint.
columns.product_id: The identifier for the product associated with the complaint.
columns.customer_id: The identifier for the customer who raised the complaint.
columns.complaint_outcome_code: The resolution status of the complaint.
columns.complaint_status_code: The current status of the complaint.
columns.complaint_type_code: The classification of the complaint type.
columns.date_complaint_raised: The date and time when the complaint was submitted.
columns.date_complaint_closed: The date and time when the complaint was resolved.
columns.staff_id: The identifier for the staff member handling the complaint.

Complaints.table_description: The table stores details regarding customer complaints.
